resources.string: Select a Circuit Playground Bluefruit device to connect to

Android requires applications to be granted the LOCATION permission in order to receive the results of a BLE scan. Please press the \"Okay\" button and grant the permission in order to use the Bluefruit Playground app.
Bluetooth and Location settings must be enabled to use the Bluefruit Playground app. \n\nPlease press \"Okay\" and then turn on Bluetooth.
Bluetooth and Location settings must be enabled to use the Bluefruit Playground app. \n\nPlease press \"Okay\" and turn the main location service switch then press the Back button.
